document.heading: Real Property Tax Benefits Revision Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-345, the “Real Property Tax Benefits Revision Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-70 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 18, 2008, and December 16, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 12, 2009, it was assigned Act No. 17-663 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-345 became effective on March 25, 2009.
